title: On Drinfeld modular curves for SL(2)
authors: Jesse Franklin, Sheng-Yang Kevin Ho, Mihran Papikian
abstract:
We study the Drinfeld modular curves arising from the Hecke congruence
subgroups of $\mathrm{SL}_2(\mathbb{F}_q[T])$. Using a combinatorial method of
Gekeler and Nonnengardt, we obtain a genus formula for these curves. In cases
when the genus is one, we compute the Weierstrass equation of the corresponding
curve.
